definition: angle/corner/horn/horn-shaped/unit of money equal to 0.1 yuan, or 10 cents (a dime)/CL:個|个[ge4]
role (theater)/to compete/ancient three legged wine vessel/third note of pentatonic scale
to compose in off-hand way (idiom); to dash off

sentences.english: Gu moon light knife edge, looking Linshao Xiao color up.
sentences.chinese: 一刀殘月淡觚棱，遙杛林梢曉色升。

sentences.english: Colored goblet's modelling talented Xiu, solemn natural, the line change is very rich.
sentences.chinese: 花觚的造型雋秀，端莊大方，線條變化十分豐富。

sentences.english: After the molten bronze cools down, take off the Fan (mould) and you'll have a "Gu" (cauldron).
sentences.chinese: 等銅液冷卻之後呢，把範去掉就做成觚了。

definition: big/cup made of horn/horn wine container
a kind of vase (old)/see 安瓿[an1 bu4]
ancient bronze food vessel with a round mouth and two or four handles/round basket of bamboo
water pot or goblet (for Chinese calligraphy)
ancient ceramic three-legged vessel used for cooking with cord markings on the outside and hollow legs
